name: YOLO (Wubs)
description:
YOLO was created for the 2019 GMTK game jam.
The theme was "Only One", 

YOLO is a game where you only live once, death will persist even if you restart the game. You have one chance to rack up a high score.

Controls: WASD or arrow keys
Goal: collect gems to earn points, don't get hit by traffic

I tried to upload a web version, but itch.io was messing up sprites.
web version: http://dev.wubsgames.com/yolo
